description.value:
The nature spirits you commune with protect you when you are the most defenseless. If you are reduced to 0 Hit Points or get the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition against your will, a number of Beasts, Fey and Plants are immediately summoned within unoccupied spaces within 20 feet of you. The Beasts, Fey and Plants summoned in this way can have a combined power of a 9th-level spell slot.

For example, you can summon either a 5th-level version, along with 2 2nd-level versions of Beasts, Fey or Plants.

If they receive no commands from you, they protect you from harm and attack your foes. The summoned Beasts, Fey or Plants lasts for 1 hour, requiring no Concentration, or until you dismiss it.

Once you use this feature, you cannot use it again until you finish a long rest, unless you expend 3 uses of your Wild Shape to use it again.
